ygData.subject: Re: Jewelery Roller coaster
ygData.msgSnippet: So we know that CHA effects vending prices and spell resists and Charm duration....and that INT gives mana.......what does WIS effect? Thanks. Fistle From:
ygData.messageBody:
So we know that CHA effects vending prices and spell resists and
Charm duration....and that INT gives mana.......what does WIS effect?

Thanks.

Fistle



From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...> on 06/10/99 07:08
AM PDT
To: eqenchanters@onelist.com@SMTP@Exchange
cc:
Subject: Re: [eqenchanters] Jewelery Roller coaster

From: "Hapke, Matthew" <mahapke@...>

Hmm 2 or 3 is pretty good when you add it up. Those INT rings for
instance at lvl 21 (my current lvl) give me about 9mana each,
instead of
the 5 mana rings.
I sell Amber rings BTW for 7plat. Try selling WIS rings and INT
rings,
I can't keep enough of them.

> -----Original Message-----

work
> at

target...taking a

stats
